channel.title: First on Karthikeyan Malaisamy

item.title: First Post
item.description: I made this website before joining Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad. It took me four months to settle down (pretence). There is an adrenaline aura to this institute that is keeping me hooked. I will share all about it and more. Stay tuned!
